videoUpload.upload_photo_subtitle: Upload a photo to create the video
videoUpload.prompt_subtitle: Even without a description, AI will create the most suitable and professional video related to your photo

detailedPrompts.model_plays_with_hair: Model elegantly plays with hair, running fingers through it with natural movement
detailedPrompts.elegant_walk_to_camera: Model walks toward camera with elegant and confident steps, maintaining posture
detailedPrompts.turns_around_camera: Model slowly turns showing every angle of the outfit with fluid and graceful movements
detailedPrompts.shows_dress_details: Model highlights special details of the outfit, smiling while gently turning left and right to showcase product details from both sides. While turning left and right, model maintains a smile and strikes various poses
detailedPrompts.beautiful_smile: Model gives a genuine and attractive smile toward camera, eyes sparkling
detailedPrompts.effective_pose_change: Model transitions fluidly from one pose to another, every movement calculated and graceful
detailedPrompts.close_up_look: Model gives an intense and captivating look at close range to camera
detailedPrompts.highlights_accessory: Model highlights jewelry or accessories, gently touching to draw attention
detailedPrompts.looks_back_over_shoulder: Model gives an attractive look back over shoulder with mysterious expression
detailedPrompts.skirt_flowing: Model shows the flow of the skirt, moving slightly to create fabric ripples
detailedPrompts.winking_gesture: Model playfully winks, displaying a cute and attractive expression
detailedPrompts.hair_flipping: Model flips hair back with graceful movement, creating dynamic visual
detailedPrompts.plays_with_necklace: Model gently touches and plays with necklace using elegant finger movements
detailedPrompts.elegant_hand_movement: Model uses hands with graceful and fluid movements, every gesture calculated and beautiful
detailedPrompts.thoughtful_gaze: Model looks at camera with thoughtful and deep gaze, showing sincere expression
detailedPrompts.smiling_face: Model gives natural and genuine smile, radiating positive energy
